weather.sunny: bright sunlight, clear skies, warm atmosphere
weather.rainy: rain drops, wet surfaces, storm clouds
weather.snowy: falling snow, white landscape, winter atmosphere

time_of_day.dawn: early morning, soft light, peaceful awakening
time_of_day.morning: bright morning light, fresh atmosphere, energetic
time_of_day.noon: strong sunlight, harsh shadows, intense brightness
time_of_day.sunset: golden hour, warm colors, romantic lighting
time_of_day.dusk: twilight, purple sky, transition to night
time_of_day.midnight: deep night, moonlight, quiet and still

seasons.spring: fresh green, blooming flowers, renewal, soft light
seasons.summer: lush vegetation, bright colors, warm atmosphere
seasons.autumn: changing leaves, warm colors, harvest time
seasons.winter: snow-covered, bare trees, cold atmosphere, crystal clear

historical.gothic: pointed arches, flying buttresses, ornate details
historical.art_deco: geometric patterns, sleek lines, metallic accents
historical.victorian: ornate details, bay windows, decorative elements

modern.minimalist: clean lines, simple forms, uncluttered spaces
modern.brutalist: raw concrete, massive forms, imposing structures
modern.contemporary: glass and steel, open spaces, modern materials

fantasy.human_medieval: stone and wood, defensive walls, practical design

natural_lighting.overcast: soft, diffused light from cloudy sky
natural_lighting.harsh_noon: strong, direct sunlight with sharp shadows

artificial_lighting.street_lights: warm pools of light in darkness
